text: Widow's Might or The Widow's Might may refer to: * Widow's Might, a 1935 British comedy film *The Widow's Might (1914 film) * The Widow's Might (1918 film), a lost American silent comedy film * The Widow's Might, a 2009 American drama film == See also == * Lesson of the widow's mite
title: Widow's Might (disambiguation)
